The British tradition of acting is part of our culture.
I feel part of a collective who care about their art.
For me, in order to become a successful performer, it's taking hard work, perseverance,...
Because you want it to be perfect.
British craftsmen are at the top of their game.
You only have to look at a film like Harry Potter to see the development that they made...
They were creating things that nobody had ever seen before.
And I figure that's something as Brits,...
...once we set our mind to something, I think we really, really do go for it.
